text: Akyar () is a rural locality (a village) in Kacheganovsky Selsoviet, Miyakinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 51 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Kirgiz-Miyaki, 6 km from Kacheganovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Miyakinsky District
title: Akyar, Miyakinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
